hero.title: Create Unforgettable
hero.description: Professional indoor playground equipment supplier. From trampoline parks to ninja courses, we deliver turnkey solutions for entertainment centers worldwide.

products.title: Commercial Playground
products.description: From design to installation, we provide complete turnkey solutions for indoor entertainment centers, family entertainment centers, and amusement parks worldwide.
products.customCta: Looking for something specific? We offer custom design services.

indoorPlayground.title: Indoor Playground Equipment
indoorPlayground.description: Multi-level play structures with slides, ball pits, climbing nets, and interactive elements for children of all ages.

trampolinePark.title: Trampoline Parks
trampolinePark.description: Complete trampoline park solutions with 12+ activity zones: foam pits, slam dunk, skyrider, 360¬∞ bicycle, climbing walls, dodgeball, and more.

ninjaCourse.title: Ninja Warrior Courses
ninjaCourse.description: Professional ninja obstacle courses featuring high-altitude challenges, climbing walls, rope courses, balance beams, and adventure obstacles.

softPlay.title: Soft Play Areas
softPlay.description: Safe and engaging soft play equipment designed specifically for toddlers and young children.

whyUs.title: Your Trusted
whyUs.description: With over 15 years of experience, we've helped thousands of businesses create exceptional indoor play experiences that drive growth and customer satisfaction.

customDesign.title: Custom Design
customDesign.description: Free 3D design service tailored to your space and brand. Our team creates unique themes that captivate visitors.

safetyCertified.title: Safety Certified
safetyCertified.description: All products meet ASTM, TUV, CE, and international safety standards. Your visitors' safety is our priority.

globalShipping.title: Global Shipping
globalShipping.description: We ship to 50+ countries with professional logistics support. Door-to-door delivery available worldwide.

warranty.title: 3-Year Warranty
warranty.description: Industry-leading 3-year warranty with lifetime technical support. We stand behind our quality.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Round-the-clock customer service to assist you at every stage, from design to installation.

directFactory.title: Direct Factory
directFactory.description: Deal directly with the manufacturer. No middlemen means competitive pricing and quality control.

certifications.title: Certifications & Standards
certifications.description: Our products comply with international safety and quality standards

process.title: From Concept to
process.description: We guide you through every step of creating your indoor playground. Our streamlined process ensures quality results and on-time delivery.

consultation.title: Consultation & Requirements
consultation.description: Share your vision, space dimensions, and budget. Our team provides expert advice on layout optimization and attraction selection.

design.title: Free 3D Design
design.description: Receive professional 3D renderings showing your customized playground. Includes floor plans, elevation views, and themed concept designs.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Production begins using premium materials and strict quality control. Regular progress updates with photos and videos throughout production.

shipping.title: Global Shipping
shipping.description: Professional packaging and logistics coordination. Door-to-door or port-to-port delivery with full tracking and customs support.

installation.title: Installation Support
installation.description: Comprehensive installation guides with video tutorials. Optional on-site installation service by our trained technicians available.

afterSales.title: After-Sales Service
afterSales.description: 3-year warranty coverage. Lifetime technical support, spare parts supply, and operational training for your staff.

contact.title: Request Your
contact.description: Tell us about your project and get a free design and quotation within 24 hours. Our team is ready to help you create the perfect play space.

form.name: Your Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your project: space size, theme preferences, budget range, timeline...
form.privacy: We respect your privacy. Your information will never be shared.

response.title: Fast Response Guaranteed
response.description: We respond to all inquiries within 24 hours. Most requests receive a reply within 2-4 hours during business hours.

toast.successDescription: Thank you for your inquiry. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
toast.errorDescription: Failed to send your message. Please try again or contact us directly.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our products, services, and process.

leadTime.question: What is the typical lead time for indoor playground equipment?
leadTime.answer: Production typically takes 25-35 days depending on the size and complexity of your project. Shipping time varies by destination - approximately 20-35 days for sea freight to most international ports. We can provide expedited options for urgent projects.

customDesign.question: Do you provide custom design services?
customDesign.answer: Yes! We offer free 3D design services tailored to your space dimensions and brand theme. Our design team will work with you to create a unique playground that maximizes your space and attracts customers. Simply provide your floor plan and requirements to get started.

safety.question: What safety certifications do your products have?
safety.answer: All our products comply with international safety standards including ASTM F1918 (USA), EN 1176 (Europe), AS 4685 (Australia), and more. We hold ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001 certifications, and are members of IAAPA. TUV and CE certificates are provided with each project.

warranty.question: What warranty do you offer?
warranty.answer: We provide a comprehensive 3-year warranty on all equipment, which is the industry's leading warranty coverage. This includes free replacement of defective parts. We also offer lifetime technical support and maintenance guidance.

installation.question: Do you provide installation support?
installation.answer: Yes, we offer multiple installation options: 1) Detailed installation manuals with video guides for self-installation, 2) Remote video guidance during installation, 3) On-site installation by our trained technicians (available for an additional fee). Most clients successfully self-install with our guidance.

budget.question: What is the budget range for a commercial indoor playground?
budget.answer: Pricing depends on size, complexity, and features. A basic soft play area starts around $15,000, while comprehensive multi-level playgrounds range from $30,000-$200,000+. Trampoline parks typically range from $50,000-$500,000+. We provide detailed quotes based on your specific requirements.

shipping.question: Can you ship to my country?
shipping.answer: Yes! We ship to over 50 countries worldwide including USA, Canada, UK, Australia, UAE, Southeast Asia, Europe, and more. We handle all export documentation and can arrange door-to-door delivery or port-to-port shipping based on your preference.

materials.question: What materials do you use?
materials.answer: We use premium, eco-friendly materials including: galvanized steel tubes (2.2mm thickness), PVC-coated foam padding, commercial-grade LLDPE plastics, fire-retardant fabrics, and non-toxic paints. All materials are rigorously tested for safety and durability.

footer.description: Professional manufacturer of commercial indoor playground equipment, trampoline parks, ninja courses and family entertainment center solutions. Serving clients worldwide since 2008.
